author: I_like_Lego
title: Now i know
review:
I bought this from some store(for 1.99 Canadian) in a bag full of bricks but it had no box no instructions, but it was a good set!All the bricks were shiny when i got them out of the bag and i used most of these bricks to build the nitrome Logo see it here(http://www.brickshelf.com/cgi-bin/gallery.cgi?f=383937)but i did not know it was this set till i was browsing Brickset and the bricks looked familiar to this set.On to the :) and :( .

PROS:)
.the hair for the boy minifig
.the hair for the girl minifig
.thing that the boy minifig is carrying
.allot of Lego brick colors
.tires,steering wheel,doors,every brick is good in this set
.Baseplate is big and you can never have enough baseplates
.Nice an SHINY

CONS:(
.I would have liked to own the box

Most of them(bricks) are still shiny overall 5/5 (don't usually do overall)............But i wish i had a CHROME DARTH VADER. (HA HA HA)
